statements: SELECT shelter_name, city, state FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT shelter_name, capacity, address, phone_number FROM emergency_shelters WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT shelter_name, city FROM emergency_shelters WHERE state = 'New York' AND capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE city='New York'
SELECT shelter_name, capacity, city FROM emergency_shelters WHERE state='California'
SELECT shelter_name, capacity FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE zip_code='10001' AND capacity > 50
SELECT shelter_name, address, phone_number FROM emergency_shelters
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT shelter_name, location FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT individual_id, name, age, gender FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE current_population < capacity;
SELECT name, shelter_name FROM displaced_individuals JOIN emergency_shelters ON displaced_individuals.shelter_id = emergency_shelters.shelter_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT shelter_id, shelter_name, location FROM emergency_shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY current_population DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender, shelter_name FROM displaced_individuals JOIN emergency_shelters ON displaced_individuals.shelter_id = emergency_shelters.shelter_id;
SELECT shelter_id, COUNT(individual_id) AS total_individuals FROM displaced_individuals GROUP BY shelter_id HAVING COUNT(individual_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE location = 'City A' AND current_population < capacity;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT shelter_name, location FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT shelter_name, capacity, available_capacity FROM emergency_shelters JOIN shelter_capacity USING (shelter_id);
SELECT name, arrival_date FROM displaced_individuals WHERE arrival_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shelter_name, location FROM emergency_shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT emergency_shelters.shelter_name, shelter_capacity.available_capacity FROM emergency_shelters JOIN shelter_capacity ON emergency_shelters.shelter_id = shelter_capacity.shelter_id WHERE shelter_capacity.available_capacity < 20;
SELECT * FROM displaced_individuals WHERE arrival_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY arrival_date ASC;

SELECT emergency_shelters.shelter_name, COUNT(displaced_individuals.individual_id) AS total_individuals FROM emergency_shelters LEFT JOIN displaced_individuals ON emergency_shelters.shelter_id = displaced_individuals.shelter_id GROUP BY emergency_shelters.shelter_name HAVING total_individuals > 5 ORDER BY total_individuals DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM shelter_occupation ORDER BY occupied_capacity DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, COUNT(log_id) as log_count FROM shelter_logs GROUP BY shelter_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM displaced_individuals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM shelter_occupation WHERE occupied_capacity > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM shelter_logs GROUP BY shelter_id HAVING num_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT shelter_id, shelter_name, capacity FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT shelter_name, location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT staff_name, role FROM staff WHERE shelter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT shelter_name, location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT d.name, d.age, e.shelter_name, o.occupants_count FROM displaced_individuals d JOIN emergency_shelters e ON d.shelter_id = e.shelter_id JOIN occupancy o ON o.shelter_id = e.shelter_id WHERE o.occupants_count > 2 ORDER BY d.age ASC;

SELECT s.staff_name, s.role, e.shelter_name, o.occupants_count, o.last_updated FROM staff s JOIN emergency_shelters e ON s.shelter_id = e.shelter_id JOIN occupancy o ON o.shelter_id = e.shelter_id WHERE s.role LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY o.last_updated DESC;

SELECT a.amenity_name, a.description, COUNT(s.staff_id) AS staff_count FROM amenities a LEFT JOIN staff s ON s.shelter_id = 3 WHERE a.description IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.amenity_name ORDER BY staff_count DESC;
